Dr. Laura told me to buy the following items:
 -Enervon (500mg)	8x a day
 -Calpol (2 tbps)	After Meals
 -Digestive Q (3 cuts)	Before Meals
 -Biogesic (7 tbps)	Every Hour
 -ReadyVon (50mg)	Once a wekk
 *refer to image
